content:
Based on our conversations so far, I would recommend the Sauvignon Blanc "Les Belles Vignes" Domaine Paul Prieur 2019 as the best bottle of wine for pairing with the Grüner Veltliner Schloss Gobelsberg Ram and the blue egg dish. This wine is known for its bright acidity and flavors of citrus, green apple, and mineral notes. It would complement the Grüner Veltliner nicely and would also work well with the dish of blue eggs, sabayon, pickled mussel, seaweed bugak, and salt bush oil. It's also under 150,000 won and from the Loire Valley in France which fits your budget and preference.

Please note that wine pairing is a matter of personal taste, so it's always a good idea to have a selection of wines available for your guests. And also, keep in mind that prices for this wine can vary depending on the importing company and the vintage, so it's always a good idea to check with the supplier for the current pricing and availability.
